entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:06 p.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low 6.
